net.majorkernelpanic.streaming
Class SessionManager

java.lang.Object
  net.majorkernelpanic.streaming.SessionManager

public class SessionManager
extends java.lang.Object

Call getManager() to get access to the SessionManager. The SessionManager has a number of utility methods to create and manage Sessions.

Nested Class Summary
static interface SessionManager.CallbackListener
          Those callbacks won't necessarily be called from the ui thread !

setDefaultVideoQuality

public void setDefaultVideoQuality(VideoQuality quality)
Sets default video stream quality, it will be used by Session.addVideoTrack().

setSurfaceHolder

public void setSurfaceHolder(SurfaceHolder surfaceHolder)
Sets the Surface required by MediaRecorder to record video and adds a callback to stop video streaming whenever Android wishes to destroy the surface.

Parameters:
surfaceHolder - A SurfaceHolder wrapping a valid surface

setSurfaceHolder

public void setSurfaceHolder(SurfaceHolder surfaceHolder,
                             boolean setACallback)
Sets the Surface required by MediaRecorder to record video.

Parameters:
surfaceHolder - A SurfaceHolder wrapping a valid surface
setACallback - Whether or not you want Session to add a callback that will stop video streaming when the surface is destroyed

Indicates whether or not a camera is being used in a Session.

Indicates whether or not the microphone is being used in a Session.
